languages.text: {n}Вигдис осекается.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... мы видели корабли, приблизившиеся к светилу. Черные творения нечеловеческой руки, сплетение острых граней и лезвий... Они выстроились вокруг звезды, после чего... простите, я не могу найти слов, чтобы описать это. Нелюди заставили светило исчезнуть без следа!"

{n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис осекается.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... мы видели корабли, приблизившиеся к светилу. Черные творения нечеловеческой руки, сплетение острых граней и лезвий... Они выстроились вокруг звезды, после чего... простите, я не могу найти слов, чтобы описать это. Нелюди заставили светило исчезнуть без следа!"

They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

{n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

{n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

{n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

languages.text: {n}音阵大师踌躇着，不知如何回答。{/n}“舰长大人……我们看到许多舰船接近了那颗恒星。那些黑色的舰船看起来非常尖锐，根本不像是人类的舰船……它们包围了那颗恒星，之后……我很抱歉，但我不知道该如何形容当时可怕的景象。那群异形让恒星消失在了虚空之中！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师踌躇着，不知如何回答。{/n}“舰长大人……我们看到许多舰船接近了那颗恒星。那些黑色的舰船看起来非常尖锐，根本不像是人类的舰船……它们包围了那颗恒星，之后……我很抱歉，但我不知道该如何形容当时可怕的景象。那群异形让恒星消失在了虚空之中！”

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse-vox hésite.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Nous avons vu approcher du soleil un certain nombre de vaisseaux non-humains de couleur noire. Enfin, plutôt des amalgames d'angles pointus, mais qu'importe. Ils se sont positionnés tout autour de l'étoile, et... Pardonnez-moi, mais j'ai dû mal à trouver les mots qui pourraient décrire l'horreur de ce dont nous avons été témoins. Les xénos ont fait disparaître le soleil dans le vide ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse-vox laisse hésite.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Nous avons vu approcher du soleil un certain nombre de vaisseaux non-humains de couleur noire. Enfin, plutôt des amalgames d'angles pointus, mais qu'importe. Ils se sont positionnés tout autour de l'étoile, et... Pardonnez-moi, mais j'ai dû mal à trouver les mots qui pourraient décrire l'horreur de ce dont nous avons été témoins. Les xénos ont fait disparaître le soleil dans le vide ! »

languages.text: {n}La maestra de vocos flaquea.{/n} «Lord Capitán... hemos visto una serie de naves acercarse al sol. Eran negras, obra de seres inhumanos. Un amasijo de ángulos y bordes cortantes... Rodearon la estrella y... Mil perdones, pero no encuentro palabras para expresar el espantoso espectáculo. ¡Los xenos han hecho que el sol se desvaneciera en el vacío!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de vocos flaquea.{/n} «Lord Capitán... hemos visto una serie de naves acercarse al sol. Eran negras, obra de seres inhumanos. Un amasijo de ángulos y bordes cortantes... Rodearon la estrella y... Mil perdones, pero no encuentro palabras para expresar el espantoso espectáculo. ¡Los xenos han hecho que el sol se desvaneciera en el vacío!».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターはためらう。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…太陽に近づく船を何隻か見ました。人間離れした黒い造形物、鋭角と輪郭の塊…船は星を取り囲み、そして…申し訳ございません。あのような光景はとても言葉では説明出来ません。異種族は太陽を、虚空に消し去ったんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターはためらう。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…太陽に近づく船を何隻か見ました。人間離れした黒い造形物、鋭角と輪郭の塊…船は星を取り囲み、そして…申し訳ございません。あのような光景はとても言葉では説明出来ません。異種族は太陽を、虚空に消し去ったんです！」
{n}ヴォクス・マスターはためらう。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…太陽に近づく船を何隻か見ました。人間離れした黒い造形物、鋭角と輪郭の塊…船は星を取り囲み、そして…申し訳ございません。あのような光景はとても言葉では説明出来ません。異種族は太陽を、虚空に消し去ったんです！」

languages.text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin stockt.{/n} "Lord Captain ... wir haben gesehen, wie sich eine Reihe von Schiffen der Sonne genähert hat. Schwarze, unmenschliche Schöpfungen, Gebilde aus scharfen Winkeln und Kanten ... Sie haben den Stern umzingelt und dann ... Verzeiht, doch mir fehlen die Worte, um diesen grauenhaften Anblick zu beschreiben. Die Xenos haben die Sonne in der Leere verschwinden lassen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin stockt.{/n} "Lord Captain ... wir haben gesehen, wie sich eine Reihe von Schiffen der Sonne genähert hat. Schwarze, unmenschliche Schöpfungen, Gebilde aus scharfen Winkeln und Kanten ... Sie haben den Stern umzingelt und dann ... Verzeiht, doch mir fehlen die Worte, um diesen grauenhaften Anblick zu beschreiben. Die Xenos haben die Sonne in der Leere verschwinden lassen!"

languages.text: {n}Voks Üstadı bocalıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan... Bir dizi geminin güneşe yaklaştığını gördük. İnsan dışı ellerden çıkma karanlık icatlar, keskin kenarlı ve köşeli alaşımlar... Yıldızı çevrelediler ve sonra... Özür dilerim fakat tanık olduğum dehşet verici manzarayı kelimelere dökmek güç. Zenolar, güneşin uçsuzda yitip gitmesine sebep oldu!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master falters.{/n} "Lord Captain... we saw a number of ships approach the sun. Black creations of inhuman make, amalgams of sharp angles and edges... They surrounded the star, and then... My apologies, but I struggle to find words that could describe that terrible sight. The xenos made the sun vanish into the void!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks Üstadı kekeliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan... Birçok geminin güneşe yaklaştığını gördük. İnsan dışı ellerden çıkma karanlık yaratımlar, keskin kenarlı ve köşeli alaşımlar... Yıldızı çevrelediler ve sonra... Özür dilerim fakat tanıklık ettiğim dehşet verici hadiseleri anlatmakta zorlanıyorum. Zenolar, güneşin uçsuzda yitip gitmesine sebep oldu!"
